description:
Weights pvc dumbbells are available in kg x 2= 2 kg comes in boxed packing
	Hand weights dumbbells for strength endurance aerobic cross fit home gym training suitable for beginners and experienced user. Ideal to use at home gym studio class or use them as running weights
	Pvc weights these hand weights are pvc dumbbells gives excellent non slip grip, which heavily increase grip during long or running session. Good protection keeping the flooring from being damaged
	Material: Rubber
	In-box Contents: PVC dumbbells weights exercise barbell for men & women
